problems_identified.problem: Users report long checkout process with 7 steps leading to abandonment on shipping page
Android image upload crashes on v12+ version
Search results are irrelevant during checkout experience

product_ideas.title: Streamlined One-Page Checkout
product_ideas.description: A simplified checkout process condensed into a single page with smart pre-filled shipping details and a progress indicator to reduce user friction.
product_ideas.impact: Decrease checkout abandonment by 30-40% by minimizing steps and improving user confidence.

product_ideas.title: AI-Optimized Image Upload
product_ideas.description: A dynamic image upload system that compresses and processes images in real-time using AI to prevent crashes on Android v12+ devices.
product_ideas.impact: Eliminate image upload crashes on Android v12+ and improve user experience during product listings.

product_ideas.title: Contextual Search During Checkout
product_ideas.description: A search feature that dynamically adjusts results based on the user's cart items and shipping location to provide relevant product suggestions.
product_ideas.impact: Improve search relevance by 50% during checkout, increasing conversion rates and reducing returns.
